sentence: "This bill to me is all about biology," said Republican state Rep. Shawnna Bolick.

sentence: "This bill to me is all about biology," said Republican Rep. Shawnna Bolick, who said she played on a coed team in the 1980s but could not have made the high school boys team.
author: The Associated Press
title: Arizona Legislature passes 2 bills to curb transgender rights
